title: A Midnight Clear
description: A story from Boughs of Evergreen: A Holiday AnthologyIt's a cold, desperate December when a young girl flees home, in search of food, shelter and the real Santa Claus. Stranded in George and Josh's hometown, she discovers that the spirit of Christmas can be found in the most unexpected of places. Includes the story of The Little Match Girl, by Hans Christian Andersen.---A standalone short story in the 'Hiding Behind The Couch' series.Note: If you are reading the series in order, this follows from 'In The Stars Part II' and contains minor spoilers.
author: Debbie McGowan
